column1: # Enteric methane yields for livestock feed categories
# Source: IPCC (2019). 2019 Refinement to the 2006 IPCC Guidelines for
# National Greenhouse Gas Inventories. Volume 4: Agriculture
# Methane yield (MY) is given in g CH4 per kg dry matter intake (DMI).
#   MY_g_CH4_per_kg_DMI: grams of CH4 per kilogram of dry matter intake

column3: High-forage diets (>75% forage), DE ≤ 62% - IPCC Table 10.12 non-dairy cattle
Mixed rations (15-75% forage + byproducts/grain), DE 62-71% - IPCC Table 10.12 mixed rations
Concentrate/grain-based feeding (0-15% forage), DE ≥ 72% - IPCC Table 10.12 feedlot
